Summary: 2 UFO Orb Lights within minutes of each other
divs: sighting detailsduring a night skywatch on march 18, 2010 i noticed a white glowing solid object heading east to west. what was intriging was how slow, low and silent it was gliding over the houses. this object appeared very different from normal air traffic here. i see planes and helicopters nightly and counted dozens of these before this sighting came along.i was on the phone with eugene erlikh at the time of the sighting. i could have made this video shorter, i do realize there is a gap where i am struggling to get the object to show up on film. i have never had these kinds of problems with my camcorder before. it seemed as the object got closer and was nearest to me my camcorder was malfunctioning. i tried everything to get the camcorder to right itself. so i left this long version in to show others why during a potential ufo sighting camcorders can experience technical difficulties. what is interesting is the end of the video when i finally do get the object back into focus, it has taken on the form of 2 seperate objects with the fake blinking lights. to add more..the dog at the neighbors house just as the object passes over starts barking repeatedly. when a real airplane is filmed especially at that low of an altitude, one can clearly see the structured craft itself. there seemed to be none on this object. only glowing lights mimicking our conventional aircraft. i have been following the alison kruse and others fake plane sightings. i didn't know what to make of it completely. after seeing this object, i am convinced there are objects that come out at night that cruise around the neighborhood, mimicking conventional aircraft. the general public knows what is conventional aircraft in the skies. debunkers and skeptics who try to scare people away from skywatching and passing on vital information. i know what i saw. to make this sighting more interesting, about 15 minutes later a glowing orange orb ( i am thinking it was the same one) came from the direction where this one just went. it headed southeast. it was even lower in the sky, made no noise and glowed. this will be clearly be seen in part 2. in the second sighting that happened about 15-20 minutes later was even better. this object was so bright gold glowing and the camcorder doesn't do it justice at all. it was bright. moving west to south east even lower over the neighborhood. so low that it was seen through the smaller trees in the front yards. it was also silent. i do not know if this was the same object. this one glowed bright gold, the other did not. one can even see the glow seems to be coming from underneath the orb and expanding out. it was very bright. these objects make no noise. i have filmed helicopters that close and they are extremely loud, please see my other videos for reference. this object, had it been a helicopter, would have been audible on film i don't know what these things were. i know what they weren't. i don't care what some people's conclusions are regarding these videos.i don't care if some people don't believe me. i know there are alot more people all over the world seeing these orbs in the night sky. i want to report my sightings so that it encourages others seeing these objects to come forward with video photos ect, to corroberate this phenomenon. mankind has a right to know. it is real and it is happening whether you believe or not. i tried to send the original footage from my pc but i think the file may be too big. here's the youtube links: part 1 : http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=s-8oxneodaq part 2: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=vgkvgts-ht4
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Youngstown
There were no other sightings in Youngstown on or around March 18th 2010
